data.eml:eml: Contribution to the genus Okinawepipona Yamane (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from Vietnam, with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nguyen, Lien Thi Phuong, Nguyen, Ha Thi Thu, Bozdoğan, Hakan (2018): Contribution to the genus Okinawepipona Yamane (Hymenoptera: Vespidae: Eumeninae) from Vietnam, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4462 (4): 592-596, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4462.4.10
